title: MyPillow Autobiography, Pence Doesn’t NEED Protection 4.30.20
itunes:title: MyPillow Autobiography, Pence Doesn’t NEED Protection 4.30.20
description:
In episode 620, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Blake Wexler to discuss Mike Pence not wearing a mask at the Mayo Clinic, Justin Amash wanting to run for president as a Libertarian, Trump forcing meat facilities to re-open, Steve Mnuchin claiming small business loans over two million will be audited, the MyPillow guys autobiography, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Leaving Off Mask At Mayo Clinic, Pence Said He Wanted To Look Workers 'In The Eye'
  2. Rep. Justin Amash to seek Libertarian Party nomination for president
  3. Workers in States Quick to Reopen Would Lose Unemployment Benefits Even if They’re Too Fearful to Return Yet
  4. Small business loans above $2 million will get full audit to make sure they’re valid, Mnuchin says
  5. Lakers got money from loan program, returned it
  6. oh -- and i cannot stress this enough -- my god
  7. WATCH: Luiz Carlos Vinhas - Ye Mele

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
